attributes.action: Contributors &pensioners to partly govern NationalInsuranceFund not The Treasury
attributes.additional_details:
An arrangement along these lines, firmly taking control of the National Insurance Fund is essential to command public ongoing support.

The system since 1999 whereby any govt currently in power, on a whim, moves the eligibility goalposts, has been disastrous and must cease.
attributes.background: "To give the National Insurance Fund the protection it deserves there should be a separate and largely autonomous financial institution, with a governing National Insurance Commission to fix rates and to propose structural changes.".-Catalyst Forum 2003 via Tony Lyons and David Hencke

rejection.details:
We understand that you want changes to how the National Insurance Fund operates but we aren't sure what changes you would like to see.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly who would oversee the Fund and how it would operate.
